definition[0]: the written abbreviation of care of, used especially in addresses when you are sending a letter or package to someone who is living in someone else’s house
example[0]: John Hammond, c/o Mrs Pearce, The Old Rectory, Reepham
definition[1]: written abbreviation for CARE OF, used when you are sending something to someone who is living in someone else’s house or receiving mail at their place of work
example[1]: John Hammond, c/o Dowling Music College, Bethesda, Maryland, Virginia
